data.message: Hello facebook developers....how can l stop seeing everything that others are commenting on here....l have complained unfollowed all of them...reported l don't want to see them...even blocked them but every time someone else  comments on those...they still show up in my notifications....l have missed some personal things from family and friends....including the loss of a friend. I am so over all of your plans and ideas...and will continue to complain and repot each one...it is getting out of control.
